subject: ALL
title: Intro. to Asian Art
info: issues/themes of south asian, southeast asian, and east asian art from earliest times to present.

subject: ALL
title: Freshman Seminar
info: topics specified in class schedule and course guide.

subject: ALL
title: Study of an Asian Language
info: study of an asian language in another country or at other non-campus locations. students study in situations complementary to regular university course offerings.

subject: ALL
title: Japanese Minority Literatures
info: fiction/poetry by okinawans, zainichi (japanese of korean descent) writers, and authors from outcaste burakumin. interrogation of \"minority literature\" as theoretical construct. alteration of what constitutes \"japanese literature.\" relationships between a group's historical experiences and literary representation.
